title: Space.Hulk.v1.4.2.Update.incl.DLC-SKIDROW
description:
Space Hulk v1.4.2 Update incl DLC

13-04-2014......Release Date <-> Protection.................Steam
Strategy...........Game Type <-> Disk(s)......................DOX

RELEASE NOTES

Read changelog.txt for information on updated content!

INSTALL NOTES

1. Unpack release
2. Run Space.Hulk.v1.4.2.Update.incl.DLC.exe
3. Install
4. Copy everything from the SKIDROW folder into the game installation
5. Block the game in your firewall and mark our cracked content as
secure/trusted in your antivirus program
6. Play the game
7. Support the companies, which software you actually enjoy!

ADDITIONAL NOTES

Includes the follwing DLC:

Preorder DLC
Kraken Skin DLC
Sword of Halcyon Campaign
Defilement of Honour Campaign
Behemoth Skin DLC
Space Wolves Chapter
